direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve operations on the optionMap, with addOption adding an option and getNames retrieving option names.
Both methods interact with the optionMap, with addOption adding an option and getOptions retrieving the options.
Both methods modify the state of the OptionGroup, with addOption adding an option and setSelected setting the selected option.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the OptionGroup state is necessary before adding options.
Retrieving the current options is useful to verify the state before and after adding a new option.
Verifying the names of the options can help in asserting the correct addition of an option.
